title: Arcade Miss Fortune's Missing Sound  - The Tale of the Forgotten Blip

embed.description: This is causing me serious psychological harm.

body:
When Miss Fortune {{champion:21}} was updated in Patch 5.22, she got a new passive (Love Tap). The Arcade MIss Fortune skin initially had two sounds for Love Tap, a primary and an alternate. **Blip, bloop**. As of patch 5.23 (and every patch since), the first sound stopped playing. **Bloop, bloop**. 

I've posted this on the bug report forums a few times, but I'm not sure if this is a bug or an intentional design choice at this point. I know it was considered a bug many months ago, but since it hasn't been fixed, I'm thinking Riot changed their minds. I greatly miss blip, however, and would prefer its return.

Here's a video with the comparison of the original and the changed version. https://youtu.be/beHrgJYdcPs

replies.body: Thanks for the helpful video.  I wish all my bug reports were like this.  I found the missing blip sfx and it will be reunited with its bloop sfx SOON.  I image by the next patch.  If you have any more audio bug related issues or this doesn't get fixed please let me know.
